title: Diagnostic issue template should have rust formatting for error messages too

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

body:
This is kind of a meta issue, but the diagnostic issue template could be improved slightly. Currently it only uses ```` ```rust ```` for the main code block, but ```` ``` ```` for the error messages. This is technically correct but makes them harder to read, compare:

```
error[E0277]: expected a `FnMut<()>` closure, found `Cloner<{integer}>`
  --> src/main.rs:24:9
   |
19 | fn foo(mut producer: impl Producer<String>) {
   |                           ---------------- required by this bound in `foo`
...
24 |     foo(Cloner(8));
   |         ^^^^^^^^^ expected an `FnMut<()>` closure, found `Cloner<{integer}>`
   |
   = help: the trait `FnMut<()>` is not implemented for `Cloner<{integer}>`
   = note: wrap the `Cloner<{integer}>` in a closure with no arguments: `|| { /* code */ }`
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `Producer<String>` for `Cloner<{integer}>`
```

```rust
error[E0277]: expected a `FnMut<()>` closure, found `Cloner<{integer}>`
  --> src/main.rs:24:9
   |
19 | fn foo(mut producer: impl Producer<String>) {
   |                           ---------------- required by this bound in `foo`
...
24 |     foo(Cloner(8));
   |         ^^^^^^^^^ expected an `FnMut<()>` closure, found `Cloner<{integer}>`
   |
   = help: the trait `FnMut<()>` is not implemented for `Cloner<{integer}>`
   = note: wrap the `Cloner<{integer}>` in a closure with no arguments: `|| { /* code */ }`
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `Producer<String>` for `Cloner<{integer}>`
```
I think this is an easy change that should be an improvement for future Diagnostic issue reports.
